identified three target use cases the
first one is around cloud migration you
may have the need to be able to move a
new application workload that has some
requirements around things like data
warehousing up to VMware on aw a VMware
cloud on AWS you may also have the need

no longer a need to convert your virtual
machines you'll be able to vmotion them
either live or cold and then finally you
can look at being able to have a look at
an infrastructure refresh and you can
use that opportunity to move up to
VMware cloud on AWS the second use case
is around data center extension you may
have found that you've got a need to
move to more of a regional or global
expansion without the need to have to
procure a hardware or a data center you
can build a new cluster up in one of our
other regions you may also have the need

you've got to build sorry you've got an
